channel.title: Comments on: Bazaar Version Control System – better than Subversion ?

item.title: By: damber

item.content:encoded:
In case you’re interested, other distributed version control systems popular at the moment are git and mercurial:

http://www.selenic.com/mercurial/
http://swik.net/git+VCS
